Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 7

Contact us:

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
7A Dallinghoo Village Hall 0945 – 1000
7B Charsfield South View, The Street 1005 – 1030
7C Monewden Church 1040 – 1050
7D Otley Spring Park 1100 – 1125
7E Otley Village Stores 1130 – 1205
7F Ashbocking The Green 1215 – 1235
7G Helmingham Forge 1240 – 1250
7H Framsden Village Hall 1400 – 1415
7I Cretingham New Bell PH 1430 – 1445
7J Brandeston Queen’s Head PH 1450 – 1510
7K Kettleburgh Church Rd 1515 – 1530

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2016: 21 January, 18 February, 17 March, 14 April, 12 May, 9 June, 7 July, 4 August, 1 September, 29 September, 27 October, 24 November, 22 December
